mapper.sql: id id , id id2 , worker_id workerId , worker_name workerName , sale_amount saleAmount, profile profile , record_date recordDate , create_time createTime , update_time updateTime, client_name clientName, is_new_client isNewClient, remark remark
mapper.update: replace into daily_sales(id , worker_id , worker_name , sale_amount , profile, record_date , create_time , update_time, client_name, is_new_client, remark) values(#{id} , #{workerId} , #{workerName} , #{saleAmount} , #{profile}, #{recordDate} , #{createTime} , #{updateTime}, #{clientName}, #{isNewClient}, #{remark});
mapper.select:
select DATE_FORMAT(record_date, '%Y-%m-%d') recordDate,SUM(`profile`) profile from daily_sales
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(record_date, '%Y-%m-%d');
